data.title: Nuke Design System
data.tagline: Element-first CSS design system with web components
data.problem: Design systems are overcomplicated with excessive abstraction layers and wrapper components.
data.solution: Simple, flat architecture: design tokens + component styles in single CSS files. Import one file, get everything.
philosophy: Element-first: style native HTML elements, not wrapper components
Universal nuke-style='1/2/3' attribute for style variants
Flat token architecture: use design tokens directly, no component-specific variable layers
Progressive enhancement: works without JS, web components add interactivity
